author: Lady Macbeth
quote: Who would have thought the old man to have had so much blood in him?

author: Henry V
quote: I know thee not, old man.

author: Romeo
quote: It is the East, and Juliet is the sun.

author: Miranda
quote: O brave new world, that has such people in 't.

author: Friar Lawrence
quote: These violent delights have violent ends.

author: Iago
quote: I hate the Moor, and it is thought abroad that 'twixt my sheets he has done my office.

author: Don John
quote: If I had my liberty, I would do my liking.

author: Puck
quote: If we shadows have offended, think but this, and all is mended.
